span.strong: Covington Schools Response to the Pandemic

strong.span: Schools are closed for the remainder of the school year

p.span: April 20, 2020 -Â GovernorÂ Andy BeshearÂ recommendedÂ that all Kentucky schools continue with Non-Traditional Instruction (NTI) for the remainder of the school year.Â
Covington Schools will continue with the NTI schedule for the remainder of the school year.Â

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,

div.p: Covington Independent Public SchoolsÂ also wants to share important resources regarding COVID-19 and information about keeping children healthy. As national, state, and local health officials have noted, universal precautions such as proper handwashing and hygiene are the best way to prevent the spread of any disease.Â
